features: A versatile and modular 3-in-1 system is designed specifically for exposure to severe weather that can be adjusted depending on conditions and activity
Tough and durable Tri-Durance HS fabric outer shell featuring a waterproof and breathable Hipora® liner for excellent protection from harsh rain, snow and wind
The relaxed fit outer layer can be worn over other mitts and gloves or on it's own as a shell for element protection in milder weather
The interior lining of the outer shell has an ultra thin, flexible insulative film that creates an extra layer of insulation
Water-resistant leather at palms, mitten tips and thumbs for added durability and grip
Palms and thumb panels are reinforced for added durability and have anti-skid grip
Soft fabric on thumbs acts as a nose wipe
Fully lined with a brushed, moisture wicking fabric for added comfort and softness
Features signature double-stripe reflective details across back of hands for added visibility in low light

Tab and-D-ring at sides of wrists work with an included carabiner that can be used to attach gloves together, or for clipping to your parka. A red hanging loop at index fingers make gloves easy to hang up to dry
An elasticated, nylon snow skirt prevents snow penetration and features a webbing handle to pull it high up the sleeve for coverage
Cuffs feature a high gauntlet shape for added protection and coverage, while a single-handed cord lock system at cuff opening allows for easy adjustments
